mapper.sql: select id, month, site, principal, type, sales_revenue, compensation, final_freight, packaging_fee, promotion_fee, platform_refund, final_freight_return, selfdelivery_commission, fba_sales_commission, other_transaction_fee, storage_fee, shipping_label_fee, platform_service_fee, platform_refund_service_fee, platform_service_adjustment_fee, advertising_fee, service_provider_fee, gross_profit, asinking_num, yc_delivery_num, price, mixed_vat, other_fee, mixed_vat2, clear_broker_fee from cpd_finance
mapper.insert:
insert into cpd_finance
month, site, principal, type, sales_revenue, compensation, final_freight, packaging_fee, promotion_fee, platform_refund, final_freight_return, selfdelivery_commission, fba_sales_commission, other_transaction_fee, storage_fee, shipping_label_fee, platform_service_fee, platform_refund_service_fee, platform_service_adjustment_fee, advertising_fee, service_provider_fee, gross_profit, asinking_num, yc_delivery_num, price, mixed_vat, other_fee, mixed_vat2, clear_broker_fee,
#{month}, #{site}, #{principal}, #{type}, #{salesRevenue}, #{compensation}, #{finalFreight}, #{packagingFee}, #{promotionFee}, #{platformRefund}, #{finalFreightReturn}, #{selfdeliveryCommission}, #{fbaSalesCommission}, #{otherTransactionFee}, #{storageFee}, #{shippingLabelFee}, #{platformServiceFee}, #{platformRefundServiceFee}, #{platformServiceAdjustmentFee}, #{advertisingFee}, #{serviceProviderFee}, #{grossProfit}, #{asinkingNum}, #{ycDeliveryNum}, #{price}, #{mixedVat}, #{otherFee}, #{mixedVat2}, #{clearBrokerFee},
mapper.delete:
delete from cpd_finance where id in
#{id}
